# State of the art

## VVUQ concepts

<https://www.researchgate.net/publication/343511775_Unified_Framework_and_Survey_for_Model_Verification_Validation_and_Uncertainty_Quantification>

<https://www.aoe.vt.edu/content/dam/aoe_vt_edu/people/faculty/cjroy/Publications-Articles/VVUQ-CMAME.Final-Accepted-FIGURES.pdf>

<https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s11831-020-09473-7>

<https://ir.vanderbilt.edu/handle/1803/17891>

<https://cstools.asme.org/csconnect/FileUpload.cfm?View=yes&ID=73615>

Notation and uncertainty intervals are taken from
<https://asmedigitalcollection.asme.org/verification/article/7/3/031005/1146443/Confidence-Intervals-for-Richardson-Extrapolation>
[@krysl2022_confidence_intervals_richardson]

The Relative Discretization Error (RDE) is taken from [@roy2005_review_verif]

<https://eikosim.com/en/technical-articles/vvuq-references-aerospace-solid-mechanics/>

<https://asmedigitalcollection.asme.org/VVS/proceedings/VVUQ2024/87769/V001T05A002/1201226>


## VVUQ software and platforms

<https://github.com/snl-dakota/dakota>

<https://easyvvuq.readthedocs.io/en/dev/>

<https://www.seavea-project.org/seaveatk/>

<https://services.excellerat.eu/>

<https://uranie.cea.fr/>

<https://persalys.fr/define_modele.php>


## Relative Area Metric

<https://asmedigitalcollection.asme.org/VVS/proceedings/VVUQ2022/85765/V001T05A001/1143094>

<https://asmedigitalcollection.asme.org/VVS/proceedings/VVUQ2022/85765/V001T05A001/1143094>

<https://www.mdpi.com/2227-7390/11/11/2511>

<https://asmedigitalcollection.asme.org/verification/article-abstract/7/4/041005/1154440/On-the-Failure-of-the-Area-Metric-for-Validation?redirectedFrom=PDF>

<https://ontonixqcm.blog/2021/10/30/on-stochastic-model-validation/>
